name: Astral Aberration
description:
Astral Aberration is a game where you explore spaceships, kidnap innocent people, and upgrade your ship by forcing said people into minimum wage labor (if minimum wage was nothing)! Mine asteroids, conquer enemy spaceships, and obtain their cores to research or sell on the hit marketing site pbay! Each additional room will unlock a new resource or function for your ship, try to get them all! There is no definitive ending for this game at the moment, although we plan on continuing the project!

Use WASD or Arrow keys to move, as well as interact with the environmenUse the mouse to click on the buttons to accomplish tasks such as boarding enemy ships and mining asteroids!
